name: Space War: Heroes
description:
This is a fast action-packed space game. This is my first game, made with gamemaker2. It's a basic game. The game is made with the DND( Drag and Drop ) method of gamemaker2. I don't write any code of line in the game. This game almost has all the features like Player movement, Player fire, Player Shield, Enemy, Enemy spawn, Enemy fire system, Parallax Background. This game has two levels. It changes automatics when you reach a score of 200, then you automatically reach the second level. At this time I do not have enough knowledge about game development and gamemaker2. Story:

One powerful evil has captured a hero’s planet and then tried to capture a whole universe but heroes tried to stop and take our planet back.

Controls:

AWSD : Movement

Mouse Left Button : Fire

Space : Shield
